concept.title: 237.102-74 TAXONOMY FOR THE ACQUISITION OF SERVICES, AND SUPPLIES AND EQUIPMENT.

conbody.p: See PGI 237.102-74 for further guidance on the taxonomy for the acquisition of services and the acquisition of supplies and equipment.
